title: Fan, 1795–1805
description: Pleated fan. Leaf of painted parchment; sticks of carved, pierced, and painted ivory; glass stone at the rivet. The central medallion depicting a woman as the allefory of painting, is after a wall painting by Angelica Kauffmann (1741-1807) originally installed in 1779 in the lecture room of the Royal Academy at Somerset House in London.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, 1795–1805.
1795–1805. Gift of Eleanor Garnier Hewitt. 1931-65-167.
